name: Origami
long_description:
Origami trains AI agents to automate SDR work to fill your pipeline with perfect leads.

Founded in 2024, we were Y Combinator's fastest growing startup and accelerate pipeline for hundreds of outbound sales reps across companies like Rho, Redesign Health, and Remote.com.â€Ž 

For outbound sales teams struggling with quota attainment, Origami's lead generation enables SDRs to connect with high-quality prospects and exceed their pipeline targets consistently. Sales leaders use Origami to find better-qualified B2B leads, reduce SDR workload, and scale outbound efforts with AI.
one_liner: Agents that find your perfect customers
